name: MEC 1.5mm Stainless Steel Teflon Disc Brake Cable
categories: 1.5mm Stainless Steel Teflon Disc Brake Cable
description: Stainless steel cable that’s pre-stretched for precise braking. Finished with slick Teflon® for reduced friction.Longer length works with mechanical disc brake (road or mountain levers).Ideal for rear brakes for tandem or cargo bikes that require a long cable reach.
